attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2002-2159

Date: 2002-12-11

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Karen M. Horner, de la ville de Calgary dans la province de l'Alberta, une avocate, soit nommée juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de l'Alberta et membre d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Alberta.



The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Karen M. Horner, of the City of Calgary, in the Province of Alberta, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta and a member ex officio of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Karen M. Horner, of the City of Calgary, in the Province of Alberta, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Justice of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta and a member ex officio of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.
